mapper.select: SELECT climatetype.climatetype as climateZone, zonetype.zonetype as livingZone, foodtype.foodtype as foodType FROM animaltype INNER JOIN climatetypefortypeofanimal ON climatetypefortypeofanimal.id_typeofanimal = animaltype.id INNER JOIN climatetype ON climatetype.id = climatetypefortypeofanimal.id_climatetype INNER JOIN zonetypefortypeanimal ON zonetypefortypeanimal.id_typeofanimal = animaltype.id INNER JOIN zonetype ON zonetype.id = zonetypefortypeanimal.id_zonetype INNER JOIN foodtypefortypeanimal ON foodtypefortypeanimal.id_typeofanimal = animaltype.id INNER JOIN foodtype ON foodtype.id = foodtypefortypeanimal.id_foodtype WHERE animaltype = #{animalType}
